resources.string: plot\n\nBig Mouth is an American adult animated coming-of-age sitcom. Teenage friends find their lives upended by the wonders and horrors of puberty. It follows a group of teenage 7th graders, including best friends Nick Birch and Andrew Glouberman, as they navigate their way through puberty with struggles like masturbation and sexual arousal all in the Westchester County suburbs of New York City.
